description:
At her homeland Lufas uncovers the reason for Parthenos` actions and hints to the real Lufas` true goals.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Il y a un truc dingue dans mon pays natal !
Kokyou ni Tondemonai Mono ga Sonzai Shita!
There Was Something Incredible in My Homeland!
故郷にとんでもないものが存在した!
